name: Futurniture
biography:
Futurniture is a Swedish design and multi-media company established in 1993 whose work "focuses on communication, where design, technology, and art fuse into a commercially viable entity" (Futurniture website). The company has participated in a broad range of projects that encompass website construction, product branding, graphic design and the production and design of various exhibitions and accompanying materials. Futurniture's approach based on the concept of flexibility which is realised through their collaboration with a wide network of artists, technicians and communicators. For further information on the company and their projects go to
http://www.futurniture.com
